00025 RegisterDefinition::RegisterDefinition(QDomNode& registerDefNode ):
00026 typeIdentifier_(), size_(0),
00027 sizeAttributes_(), volatile_(General::BOOL_UNSPECIFIED),
00028 access_(General::UNSPECIFIED_ACCESS), reset_(), fields_() {
00029 
00030         for (int i = 0; i < registerDefNode.childNodes().count(); ++i) {
00031                 QDomNode tempNode = registerDefNode.childNodes().at(i);
00032 
00033                 if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:typeIdentifier")) {
00034                         typeIdentifier_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00035                         typeIdentifier_ = General::removeWhiteSpace(typeIdentifier_);
00036                 }
00037                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:size")) {
00038                         size_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue().toInt();
00039                         General::parseAttributes(tempNode, sizeAttributes_);
00040                 }
00041                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:volatile")) {
00042                         volatile_ = General::str2BooleanValue(
00043                                         tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue());
00044                 }
00045                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:access")) {
00046                         access_ = General::str2Access(
00047                                         tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue(),
00048                                         General::UNSPECIFIED_ACCESS);
00049                 }
00050                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:reset")) {
00051                         reset_ = QSharedPointer<Reset>(new Reset(tempNode));
00052                 }
00053                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:field")) {
00054 
00055                         fields_.append(QSharedPointer<Field>(new Field(tempNode)));
00056                 }
00057         }
00058 
00059         // if size was not defined
00060         if (size_ == 0) {
00061                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory size not defined in"
00062                                 " spirit:register"));
00063         }
00064 }
00065 
00066 RegisterDefinition::RegisterDefinition( const RegisterDefinition& other ):
00067 typeIdentifier_(other.typeIdentifier_),
00068 size_(other.size_),
00069 sizeAttributes_(other.sizeAttributes_),
00070 volatile_(other.volatile_),
00071 access_(other.access_),
00072 reset_(),
00073 fields_() {
00074 
00075         if (other.reset_) {
00076                 reset_ = QSharedPointer<Reset>(new Reset(*other.reset_.data()));
00077         }
00078 
00079         foreach (QSharedPointer<Field> field, other.fields_) {
00080                 if (field) {
00081                         QSharedPointer<Field> copy = QSharedPointer<Field>(
00082                                 new Field(*field.data()));
00083                         fields_.append(copy);
00084                 }
00085         }
00086 }
00087 
00088 RegisterDefinition& RegisterDefinition::operator=( const RegisterDefinition& other ) {
00089         if (this != &other) {
00090                 typeIdentifier_ = other.typeIdentifier_;
00091                 size_ = other.size_;
00092                 sizeAttributes_ = other.sizeAttributes_;
00093                 volatile_ = other.volatile_;
00094                 access_ = other.access_;
00095 
00096                 if (other.reset_) {
00097                         reset_ = QSharedPointer<Reset>(new Reset(*other.reset_.data()));
00098                 }
00099                 else {
00100                         reset_ = QSharedPointer<Reset>();
00101                 }
00102                 
00103                 fields_.clear();
00104                 foreach (QSharedPointer<Field> field, other.fields_) {
00105                         if (field) {
00106                                 QSharedPointer<Field> copy = QSharedPointer<Field>(
00107                                         new Field(*field.data()));
00108                                 fields_.append(copy);
00109                         }
00110                 }
00111         }
00112         return *this;
00113 }

00116 }

00118 void RegisterDefinition::write(QXmlStreamWriter& writer) {
00119         // if optional typeIdentifier is specified
00120         if (!typeIdentifier_.isEmpty()) {
00121                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:typeIdentifier", typeIdentifier_);
00122         }
00123 
00124         // if mandatory size is not defined
00125         if (size_ == 0) {
00126                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory size not defined in spirit:"
00127                                 "register"));
00128         }
00129         else {
00130                 // open the spirit:size tag
00131                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:size");
00132 
00133                 General::writeAttributes(writer, sizeAttributes_);
00134                 writer.writeCharacters(QString::number(size_));
00135 
00136                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:size
00137         }
00138 
00139         // if optional volatile is defined
00140         if (volatile_ != General::BOOL_UNSPECIFIED) {
00141                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:volatile",
00142                                 General::booleanValue2Str(volatile_));
00143         }
00144 
00145         // if optional access is specified
00146         if (access_ != General::UNSPECIFIED_ACCESS) {
00147                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:access",
00148                                 General::access2Str(access_));
00149         }
00150 
00151         // if optional reset exists
00152         if (reset_) {
00153                 reset_->write(writer);
00154         }
00155 
00156         // write all fields
00157         for (int i = 0; i < fields_.size(); ++i) {
00158                 fields_.at(i)->write(writer);
00159         }
00160         return;
00161 }

00200 void RegisterDefinition::setReset(Reset* reset) {
00201         if (reset_) {
00202                 reset_.clear();
00203         }
00204         this->reset_ = QSharedPointer<Reset>(reset);
